title: A fast-response adaptive hierarchical mode triboelectric nanogenerator for random gust energy harvesting
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00869C, Paper
Shujing Sha, Mingjian Qin, Xin Yu, Zhibo Xu, Xiaohui Lu
A fast-response adaptive hierarchical mode triboelectric nanogenerator for gust energy harvesting with high performance is proposed.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
